paragraph_1.content:
Dear Yasin Saleem,

We are pleased to offer you the position of AIML intern at Turn2Law.

paragraph_2.content: Your start date will be 13 November, 2025 and you will report to the Head of the AIML Department.

paragraph_3.content: This is an unpaid internship. You will receive practical experience and training in AIML applications within the legal field.

paragraph_4.content: Please sign and return this letter by 27 November, 2025 to indicate your acceptance of this offer.
